CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( UserRole__c ,'Primary') ,'Primary Applicant', IF(ISPICKVAL( UserRole__c ,'Secondary'),'Secondary Applicant','External Reviewer'))
CustomField.label: X_User Role
